snippet: Civil rights lawyers filed a lawsuit on Wednesday asking a judge to strike down Ohio’s ban on same-sex weddings as unconstitutional.
abstract: Civil rights lawyers file lawsuit asking a judge to strike down Ohio’s gay marriage ban as unconstitutional and allow same-sex couples to wed in state.
lead_paragraph: Civil rights lawyers filed a lawsuit on Wednesday asking a judge to strike down Ohio’s ban on same-sex weddings as unconstitutional.

headline.main: Ohio: Suit Seeks to Overturn Gay-Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Suit Seeks to Overturn Gay-Marriage Ban

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
